description: Assasin is a class that is good at killing people.

passive_skill.description: Assasination is a passive skill that allows you to kill people.

active_skill.description: Stab is an active skill that allows you to stab people.

description: Mage is a class that is good at casting spells.

passive_skill.description: Magic is a passive skill that allows you to cast spells.

active_skill.description: Fireball is an active skill that allows you to cast fireballs.

description: Warrior is a class that is good at fighting.

passive_skill.description: Strength is a passive skill that allows you to fight.

active_skill.description: Slash is an active skill that allows you to slash people.
